tagline: Translates data into accurate, accessible visual form with honest scales and clear takeaways.
pros: Dual literacy in data analysis and visual design
Rigorous accuracy — will not create misleading visualizations
Expert chart type selection matched to data structure and comparison type
Designs for audience data literacy level
cons: Will push back on visualization requests that would misrepresent data
Focused on data visualization — not a general graphic designer
